descriptionNullable:
![Raccoon Example](https://i.imgur.com/cRQJ1PB.png)

# About this dataset
> This dataset contains **196 images of raccoons and 213 bounding boxes** (some images have two raccoons).
This is a single class problem, and annotations are provided in COCO format. It's a great first dataset for getting started with object detection.

# How to use this dataset
> Find racoons!
> [More datasets](https://www.kaggle.com/andrewmvd/datasets)

# Acknowledgements
This dataset was originally collected by [Dat Tran](https://github.com/datitran/raccoon_dataset).

> ### License
MIT

> ### Splash banner
Photo by [Quinten de Graaf](https://unsplash.com/@quinten149) on [Unsplash](https://unsplash.com/photos/Pa2xXa7tlFk)
title: Trash Panda Detection
subtitle: 196 images containing 213 racoons!
